name: Human Paradox
description: Surrealistrasyon//Şerif Gümüşbaş//Ink//5300x5700 pixel//Human is a crowd and chaos trying to stay together with dozens of contradictory emotions, states and decisions. Despite their differences, the harmony the crowd come together and create brings us into existence. Or they hasten our destruction by fighting//Drawing is an impressive form of expression for me with its universal and differentiating structure for each viewer. And I like to use automatism as a tool to transfer the impressions I have gained while continuing to research and learn in many disciplines. Because I think this method is a symbolic, mysterious and striking way of expressing
